meanings.definition: A fast, powerful car used in drag racing.
meanings.sent1: The dragsters lined up at the starting line, ready to race.
meanings.sent2: Fans cheered as the dragsters sped down the track.
meanings.sent3: The dragsters decided to have a friendly race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The dragsters roared like lions as they raced side by side.
meanings.sent5: The shiny dragsters gleamed under the bright sun, captivating everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The dragsters prepared their cars for the upcoming race.
meanings.sent2: She became a dragster after falling in love with the sport.
meanings.sent3: The dragster joked with friends about their latest racing adventures.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the fastest dragster in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The dragster's determination and skill made them a respected competitor in the racing community.

meanings.definition: To drive or race in a dragster.
meanings.sent1: He loved to dragster down the track, feeling the speed and adrenaline.
meanings.sent2: She decided to dragster professionally after years of practice.
meanings.sent3: The friends planned to dragster together on the weekend for fun.
meanings.sent4: They would dragster through the streets late at night, enjoying the thrill.
meanings.sent5: The champion dragstered past the finish line, victorious and proud of their achievement.
